channel.title: Phone Cell Girlfriend Birthday Experiment Sushi on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Phone Cell Girlfriend Birthday Experiment Sushi on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: ghosts
item.description: i got my new phone. it is quite something. I am unable to post pictures with it yet.. I don’t know why. but I imagine soon. I just have to experiment. heh. experiment. yesterday I hleped scott with a surprise party after he closed on his house and asked his girlfriend beth to marry him. weird. it was pretty fun. I had too much sushi and too much alcohol and ended up going to bed around twelve - which ruled.
